text: Sonic the Hedgehog (commonly known as Sonic '06) is a 3D platform game. It was released in 2006 for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. It was originally meant to be a reboot of the Sonic the Hedgehog series. ==Plot== ==Gameplay== ==Reception== The game is considered one of the worst Sonic the Hedgehog games of all time. It is notorious for having lots of glitches and long loading times. ==References== Category:2006 video games Category:3D platformers Category:Apocalyptic video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:Post- apocalyptic video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Sonic the Hedgehog games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Xbox 360 games
